item.title: Directions
item.description:
You can get to the location in the following ways:

  • Taxi
  • Public transit
  • Car

Taxi

Taxis: Taxi UVO

Phone number: 0595-412611
website: www.uvovervoer.nl

Alternatively, you can let a member of staff help you get a taxi.

Public Transit

There is a regular bus service that runs to around 11:30 PM, for the most accurate information check 9292.nl.

Please note that there is quite a walk from the bus stop to the ceremony and reception location.

By car

Directions

Parking

There is parking at the Regthuys.

item.title: Information
item.description:
Photo policy

Feel free to take photos of your own, and it would be greatly appreciated if you share them with us. If you do post on social media, please use the #jetfieldwedding hashtag.

Wedding Gifts

Your presence at our wedding is all that we wish for, however, if you want to give a gift, we would be grateful for a cash donation towards our honeymoon and a new home.”

Ceremony

St. George’s Lutheran Church

410 College St
Toronto ON M5T 1S8

It means a lot that we are able to have a ceremony at this church. St. George’s has been Kathryn’s family’s church for over 70 years and she was christened and confirmed there. It is located on the north side of College Street, just east of Bathurst (at Lippincott).

Reception

Guild Inn Estate

201 Guildwood Pkwy
Scarborough ON M1E 1P5

The Guild Inn Estate is Toronto’s hidden gem on the waterfront. Situated on the Scarborough Bluffs overlooking Lake Ontario, it is surrounded by 88 acres of beautifully landscaped gardens. Our reception will be held in the Bickford House, which is part of the original estate.

(Add Map Embed)

item.title: Menu
item.description:
Appetizers

Grilled Portobello Mushrooms with Goat Cheese and Roasted Red Pepper. Served over five leaf lettuce with Citrus Balsamic Vinaigrette

And

Lobster Ravioli with a Mornay Sauce

Entrees

Thyme & Lemon rubbed Grilled Cornish Hen, with Citrus Demi

Or

Duo of New York Striploin & Black Tiger Shrimp

Or

Roasted Salmon Filet with Seared Scallops in a Lobster Butter Sauce

Or

Bento Box with Braised Tofu, Tempura Vegetables, Glass Noodles, and Seaweed Salad

Dessert

Dulche de Leche Caramel Mousse Cheesecake
Coffee/Tea

item.title: RSVP
item.description:
The RSVP form has been closed. Please get in touch with us in case of any last minute changes.

You can reach us at kathryn-and-jeroen@jetfield.eu

item.title: Schedule
item.description:
2:30 PM - Wedding Ceremony at St. George’s

5:00 PM - Cocktail Reception at the Bickford House, Guild Inn

6:30 PM - Dinner

9:00 PM - Party!

11:45 PM - Send-Off

12:00 AM - Event ends
